entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Centralize more toolsetversion-related data for tests #41583
  • Date Conversion problem, I spent 1 day looking for this problem, then I found out that it is in .NET 8. Converted in .NEt5 and worked fine. could not do exactly this format. (Fri Jun 14 2024 11:19:16 GMT+0500 (Узбекистан, стандартное время)) #41567

Closed

  • Select latest RTM-level SDK instead of latest SDK by default #9372
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix frameworks option forwarding for 'dotnet nuget why' #41585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41581
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dotnet help command description #41569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Enhancements to Pull Request Creation/Update in `CreateBaselineUpdatePR` Tool #41160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.6.24312.1 #41558
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • update sdk preview 5 #41560
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add --rid top level option #41540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41534
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
